content: Singaporean real-life crime show (2011â€“2013) ***In Cold Blood*** is an English-language television docu-drama telecast on [MediaCorp Channel 5](/wiki/Channel_5_(Singaporean_TV_channel)), with each episode re-enacting a major violent crime in Singapore. The series first premiered on Channel 5 in 2011. A total of three seasons were run in the years 2011, 2012 and 2013. The show was hosted by actor [Keagan Kang](/wiki/Keagan_Kang) in all three seasons. Currently, the show is viewable on [meWATCH](/wiki/MeWATCH) (previously named Toggle). ## Episodes ### Season 1 (2011) 1. [Fatal Attraction](/wiki/Abduction_of_Sindee_Neo) 2. [Morbid Jealousy](/wiki/Murder_of_Chitrabathy_Narayanasamy) 3. Gambling Addiction 4. Maid Abuse 5. The Tenant 6. Love Hurts 7. Parental Abuse 8. [Child Abuse](/wiki/1999_Ang_Mo_Kio_child_abuse_case) 9. [Depression](/wiki/Murder_of_Pan_Hui) 10. [Frontal Lobe Syndrome](/wiki/Murder_of_Ramona_Johari) 11. [Teen Terrors](/wiki/1999_Ang_Mo_Kio_torture_case) 12. [Murder She Wrote](/wiki/Murder_of_Manap_Sarlip) ### Season 2 (2012) 1. [The Curse](/wiki/Stirling_Road_murder) 2. Scar Boy 3. Problems-In-Law 4. Red String Death 5. Maid in a Box 6. [The Hero That Wasn't](/wiki/Murder_of_Daniel_De_Rozario) 7. Act of Desperation 8. [Post Traumatic Stress Syndrome](/wiki/Killing_of_Riana_Agustina) 9. [Robbery Gone Wrong](/wiki/Murder_of_Lee_Kok_Cheong) 10. [Deadly Panic](/wiki/Murder_of_Boo_Tiang_Huat) 11. [Gross Overreaction](/wiki/1998_Tampines_flat_murder) 12. Graves' Disease ### Season 3 (2013) 1. I Killed My Mother 2. God of Hell 3. Mummy 4. The Eyes Have It 5. [Baby Killer](/wiki/Anjeli_Elisaputri_rape_and_murder) 6. [Cabby Killer](/wiki/Murder_of_Yuen_Swee_Hong) 7. Stomped 8. [Death By Poison](/wiki/Quek_Loo_Ming_case) 9. [Murder For Gold](/wiki/Mandai_burnt_car_murder) 10. Kleptomania 11. [Menace of Society](/wiki/Murder_of_Choo_Xue_Ying) 12. Lethal Silence
title: In Cold Blood (Singaporean TV series)
